item.title: Altair vs. Bokeh (part 1)
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> Simple Bar Chart This is the first of what I hope will be a series of posts comparing Altair and Bokeh. Both are actively supported python packages for making interactive visualizations. This post will only scratch the surface, but is intended to show the basic differences in how they approach creating visualizations. To begin, let's create some data and a basic bar chart in matplotlib, as a baseline, and include the output as a png image below.
